data.comment: The match has started.
The match has started.
Sascha Stegemann signals a throw-in for M´gladbach, close to Dortmund's area.
Important block from the Dortmund defence as [62] fires in a strike for [63].
Can M´gladbach get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dortmund's half?
M´gladbach advance rapidly upfield but Sascha Stegemann blows for offside.
At Borussia-Park, M´gladbach are penalized for being offside.
Throw-in M´gladbach.
Free kick Dortmund.
Dortmund awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to Dortmund in their own half.
M´gladbach to take a throw-in in Dortmund territory.
Can M´gladbach capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Dortmund's half?
Stefan Lainer gets his shot on target but fails to score for M´gladbach.
M´gladbach have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Dortmund in their own half.
Ball safe as M´gladbach is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Thorgan Hazard.
Erling Haaland instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
Matthias Ginter for M´gladbach is back on the field again.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Monchengladbach to check on Matthias Ginter, who is grimacing with pain.
M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for M´gladbach at Borussia-Park.
Sascha Stegemann awards the home team a throw-in.
M´gladbach are pushing forward but Ramy Bensebaini's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Dortmund goal kick.
Sascha Stegemann waits before resuming play because Emre Can for Dortmund is still down.
Dortmund's Emre Can looks ok and returns to the pitch.
M´gladbach awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Dortmund in their own half.
Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to M´gladbach in their own half.
Ball safe as M´gladbach is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
Ramy Bensebaini of M´gladbach gets in a strike, but is off target.
Dortmund have a goal kick.
Sascha Stegemann signals a M´gladbach throw-in in Dortmund's half.
Corner awarded to Dortmund.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Monchengladbach.
M´gladbach needs to be cautious. Dortmund have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Dortmund in the half of M´gladbach.
Goal kick for M´gladbach at Borussia-Park.
Can M´gladbach get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dortmund's half?
Throw-in high up the field for M´gladbach in Monchengladbach.
Dortmund awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Denis Zakaria.
M´gladbach to take a throw-in in Dortmund territory.
Sascha Stegemann signals a Dortmund throw-in in M´gladbach's half.
Throw-in for Dortmund at Borussia-Park.
Denis Zakaria, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Tony Jantschke is the substitute for M´gladbach.
Dortmund's Emre Can gets in a shot but it is blocked by a M´gladbach defender.
In Monchengladbach, M´gladbach push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Erling Haaland (Dortmund) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Dortmund have been awarded a corner by Sascha Stegemann.
Mats Hummels (Dortmund) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
M´gladbach's Alassane Plea gets in a shot on goal at Borussia-Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Sascha Stegemann awards Dortmund a goal kick.
Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
Axel Witsel (Dortmund) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick for M´gladbach in the half of Dortmund.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Sascha Stegemann awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Dortmund.
The first half has been concluded at Borussia-Park.
Dan-Axel Zagadou (Dortmund) gets a yellow card.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Throw-in M´gladbach.
Throw-in for Dortmund in the half of M´gladbach.
Throw-in for Dortmund close to the penalty box.
Jonas Hofmann for the home team is judged to be offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
M´gladbach to take a throw-in in Dortmund territory.
M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Sascha Stegemann.
Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
Goal! Lars Stindl levels the match at 1-1.
Alassane Plea with an assist there.
Ramy Bensebaini (M´gladbach) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Can Dortmund get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in M´gladbach's half?
Sascha Stegemann awards the away team a throw-in.
M´gladbach push upfield but Sascha Stegemann quickly pulls them for offside.
M´gladbach push forward at Borussia-Park and Florian Neuhaus gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Dortmund defence.
M´gladbach awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Dortmund awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Borussia-Park, Christoph Kramer has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Dortmund drive upfield and Axel Witsel gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a M´gladbach defender.
Dortmund push upfield and Thorgan Hazard gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert M´gladbach defence.
Ball goes out of play for a M´gladbach goal kick.
M´gladbach make their second substitution with Marcus Thuram replacing Jonas Hofmann.
The away team replace Julian Brandt with Jadon Sancho.
In Monchengladbach a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Dortmund have been awarded a corner by Sascha Stegemann.
Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to M´gladbach.
Free kick for Dortmund in the half of M´gladbach.
Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to Dortmund.
Goal! Achraf Hakimi gives Dortmund a 1-2 lead in Monchengladbach.
That's a fine assist from Jadon Sancho.
Erling Haaland is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Dortmund’s Erling Haaland is on his feet again at Borussia-Park.
Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to M´gladbach in their own half.
Emre Can is booked for the away team.
Free kick M´gladbach.
Ramy Bensebaini (M´gladbach) has received a first yellow card.
Dortmund's Jadon Sancho has been booked in Monchengladbach.
In Monchengladbach a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Marco Rose (M´gladbach) is making a third substitution, with Breel Embolo replacing Christoph Kramer.
Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to Dortmund in their own half.
Jadon Sancho (Dortmund) strikes – and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
Ball safe as M´gladbach is awarded a throw-in in their half.
M´gladbach's Breel Embolo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Monchengladbach.
Sascha Stegemann signals a Dortmund throw-in in M´gladbach's half.
Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to M´gladbach.
Can M´gladbach capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Dortmund's half?
Throw-in for Dortmund in the half of M´gladbach.
Thorgan Hazard is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Thorgan Hazard (Dortmund) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Giovanni Reyna.
Free kick Dortmund.
Matthias Ginter for M´gladbach has been booked by Sascha Stegemann and receives a first yellow card.
Erling Haaland for Dortmund gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for M´gladbach at Borussia-Park.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Dortmund to take a throw-in in M´gladbach territory.
Throw-in for M´gladbach at Borussia-Park.
Throw-in for M´gladbach in their own half.
M´gladbach awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Raphael Guerreiro (Dortmund) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Stefan Lainer (M´gladbach) has received a first yellow card.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
Dortmund awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sascha Stegemann signals a Dortmund throw-in in M´gladbach's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as M´gladbach is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for M´gladbach at Borussia-Park.
Throw-in for M´gladbach in their own half.
In Monchengladbach M´gladbach's Breel Embolo is caught offside.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-2.
Florian Neuhaus (M´gladbach) has been booked and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Lucien Favre is making the team's third substitution at Borussia-Park with Manuel Akanji replacing Erling Haaland.
